review: Got one of these in bedroom. Great way to add smart functions to an older "Not Smart TV". I was worried that being only on wifi It would shudder  while streaming HD content off the web. Nope it plays perfectly. I like all the apps you can add to it and the fact that you can even use your smart phone as a remote.I did side load Kodi on it, and it plays super fast. Also love that it is so portable, easy to take on vacation and use in hotel. Worth every cent I paid for it. I tell all my friends to buy these...and they have.
author: Ron

review: I travel a lot, and keep this at my hotel so that I can watch Netflix, Amazon, and slingbox on the hotel TV.  I have Apple TVs at home and after using this, I have replaced the Apple TVs with fire sticks.  The interface is incredibly good, simple to set up, and works well whatever TV.  The interface is really easy and it's incredibly portable.
